programme.desc: A family torn apart 8 years ago during a disastrous winter solstice dinner reunites when their cousin returns home from England, hoping to mend relations after things had fallen apart.

programme.desc: A failed drug raid leaves an undercover cop trapped and a drug lord vowing to seek revenge. Senior Police Inspector Li resorts to blackmailing a drug dealer with his daughter to arrest the drug lord.

programme.title: Septet : The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Starring Sammo Hung, Ann Hui, Patrick Tam, Yuen Wo Ping, Johnnie To & more, Hong Kong's seven most revered directors compose an anthology of stories for their beloved city.

programme.title: Love at First Lie
programme.desc: Ordinary girl Bao meets troubled rich guy Edward. They conspire to ruin his father's remarriage and love blossoms. However, their romance takes an unexpected turn...

programme.desc: An innocent Hong Kong businessman is wrongfully imprisoned in a brutal multinational prison, and must escape the sadistic warden's torture to survive.
